channel.title: So
channel.description: I'm thinking of learning some rsc-coding-stuff. What's the program I should use to edit say class files? Whats the encoding? etc etc Very basic stuff If someone could give me some tips just to get started, I'd appreciate it.

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:4, topic:430497”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=533178.msg3897441#msg3897441 date=1327442783]
Don’t waste your time with Notepad++ unless your editing minor things…
Eclipse IDE
[/quote]
For a new user with zero programming experience learning basic Java syntax is daunting enough. I’d suggest using Eclipse after you’re at least mildly comfortable with how Java works in regards to compiling and what not.[/quote]

Eclipse will allow the new user to rapidly learn.

Read full topic

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:2, topic:430497”]unfortunately we don’t have any basic client modification tutorials these days, but for the editing program i’d suggest Notepad++. if you want an IDE either get Eclipse or IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition

edit these might or might not be useful:
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812064707/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/help.php
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812065147/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/item.php
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812061058/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/ascii.php
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812061811/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/autofighting.php
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812062701/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/basic.php
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812063809/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/commands.php
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812064204/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/filter.php
http://web.archive.org/web/20040812070130/http://www.rei-net.org/bots/loading.php[/quote]Yea, I’m done with bots for now, turns out their way too easy to make lol.

Read full topic

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:3, topic:430497”]Don’t waste your time with Notepad++ unless your editing minor things…
Eclipse IDE[/quote]
For a new user with zero programming experience learning basic Java syntax is daunting enough. I’d suggest using Eclipse after you’re at least mildly comfortable with how Java works in regards to compiling and what not.

Read full topic

item.description:
@vortex wrote:

edit these might or might not be useful:
